channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Bitcoin jumps thanks to Trump, as investors weigh Democratic ticket change
item.description: Bitcoin‚Äôs price jumped on Friday as crypto investors continued to be buoyed by Republican presidential front-runner Donald Trump‚Äôs embrace of digital assets and digested reports that President Joe Biden could drop out of the White House race.

item.title: AOC rallies to Biden's side as progressives split over backing his 2024 campaign
item.description: The New York progressive has emerged as an unexpected voice speaking out against the Democratic ‚Äúdonors‚Äù and ‚Äúelites‚Äù she says are trying to push the president out.

item.title: Top UN court says Israel's occupation of Palestinian territories is illegal
item.description: The advisory opinion by judges at the International Court of Justice was not binding but carries weight under international law and may weaken support for Israel.

item.title: ‚ÄòI‚Äôm not jealous ‚Äî just genuinely curious‚Äô: How can a woman work from home and mind her 3-year-old child at the same time?
item.description: ‚ÄúWhat do you all think about employees who work from home and have little kids to watch at the same time?‚Äù

item.title: Trump ally Allen Weisselberg released from jail
item.description: Weisselberg, the former chief financial officer of the Trump Organization, was sentenced in April to five months behind bars after he pleaded guilty to two counts of perjury.

item.title: Thousands of Disneyland workers vote to authorize a strike
item.description: The employees at the center of the labor fight include custodians, ride operators, candymakers and merchandise clerks at the theme park and resort complex.

item.title: ‚ÄòShe screamed and raged at me‚Äô: I have power of attorney for my mother‚Äôs $3 million estate ‚Äî but my sister feels sidelined. How do I get her off my back?

item.title: Senate Finance chair Sherrod Brown calls on Biden to drop out, joins over 30 lawmakers
item.description: President Joe Biden for weeks has resisted calls to step aside and let another Democrat run for the White House against Donald Trump, the Republican nominee.

item.title: Microsoft-CrowdStrike issue causes 'largest IT outage in history'
item.description: A major IT outage has grounded planes and sent broadcasters off air.

item.title: ‚ÄòShe‚Äôs a danger to herself‚Äô: Our late brother left us $3 million, but my sister is in hospital with schizophrenia. Should I take control of her finances?
item.description: ‚ÄúAt the moment, we are both in Florida, but the inheritance is in a California probate court.‚Äù

item.title: Cash is yielding 5% and many Americans are still missing out. How to juice your savings
item.description: High interest rates have been bad news for consumer debt ‚Äì but they are an opportunity for savers.

item.title: Senate Finance chair Sherrod Brown calls on Biden to drop out, joins over 30 lawmakers
item.description: President Joe Biden for weeks has resisted calls to step aside and let another Democrat run for the White House against Donald Trump, the Republican nominee.

item.description: ‚ÄúAt the time, I only had one family member in the state, and they did not have access to the card.‚Äù

item.title: Flights grounded and passengers warned of delays amid global IT outage
item.description: A slew of airlines said operations would be impacted on one of the busiest flight days of the year.

item.title: Dow tumbles more than 370 points, S&P 500 posts worst week since April as investors dump big tech: Live updates
item.description: The S&P 500 posted its worst week since April amid a market rotation.
